question:
Which of the following is the correct chronological order of
i) The annexation of Sambalpur by Doctrine of lapse
ii) The great revolt
iii) Khurda rebellion
iv) Diwani rights
explanation: The annexation of Sambalpur by Doctrine of lapse (1849), The great revolt (1857), Khurda rebellion (1817), Diwani rights (1765)
